DOC.brief_title: A Confirmatory Study KUC-7483 Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patients symptom overactive bladder 6 month . Patients meet following condition 3day bladder diary period . mean number micturition per 24 hour ≥8 time mean number urgency episodes per 24 hour ≥1 time Patients diagnose stress urinary incontinence predominant . Patients urinary calculus , interstitial cystitis , clinically significant urinary tract infection .
